name: Five Shows at Wario's
storyline:
You are Bruno Gate, a not so good husband but a caring father
Who's daughter needed medical help to survive
So you head to steal the secret recipe of the Famous Restaurant Wario's Factory
In which you took the lives of the head five of the factory
And as you find the recipe you hear a noise behind you then you see your victims reanimated and then they attack
You awaken in a unfamiliar town of darkness
Then you enter a theater in which you are told to do a task that will leave everyone in awe
Suddenly you receive a message telling who you are and to not believe the lie you were told
summary: Five Shows at Wario's is a fan game that combines the Wario franchise with the FNAF universe.
